labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: event handling
labels.description: How events from the server are responded to

labels.name: high priority
labels.description: should be done as soon as possible

labels.name: issue requires user response
labels.description: Issue cannot be progressed without further information

labels.name: PR needs review
labels.description: This PR requires reviewing to proceed

labels.name: PR needs update
labels.description: PR has been reviewed & is awaiting update or response to reviewer feedback
